Introducing What's On:

A social media companion for events

Whether you’re a theme park, university, or any bustling community, our powerful app is designed to engage everyone on your premises. With an intuitive map interface, What’s On: provides a dynamic experience which gives users a real-time snapshot of events in their area.

This concept would revolutionise the way we do our socials and big events. The ability to advertise our events would fundementally change how we do our recruitment and marketing.

Harvey Mellor

URY Station Manager

We are very interested in this product and think it would bring a lot of value to the student body and their interest groups. Very exciting!

Pierrick Roger

YUSU President

Having the option to market our various on-campus events directly to the student body, specifying particular locations, would completely shift student engagement within our society.

Mia Duncan

BandSoc President

01

Interactive Map

See What's On: near you in the past, present or future with a fully interactive map. Each map pin represents an event, and the heatmap shows its popularity. Promote events with ease, and get an instant feel for engagement.

02

Share Events

Interested in an event? Find all the information with a simple click. Scroll through posts and see what others have to say; choosing an event is never left to chance!

03

User Presentations

Text, photographs, video, you name it! Presentation style posts use dynamic multimedia to tell your story.

04

Post Creation

Clients can share their views or experiences with our powerful post creation tool. They can create insightful, hilarious, or just simply helpful posts, as easily as on their favourite social media, pinned to the event via its unique hashtag.

05

Personalised UI

Create a unique look and feel for your What's On: platform, so your customers feel part of something special. With a company specific login and complete control of your content, your clients' wants and desires have never been clearer.
